security: This document contains personal information such as social security numbers and salary details of employees working for the Select Committee on Assassinations. Sharing this information could violate privacy and potentially expose individuals to identity theft or other forms of harm.
summary: These are payroll certifications for the U.S. House of Representatives Select Committee on Assassinations for the accounting period of February 1, 1977, to February 28, 1977, detailing employee names, social security numbers, salaries, and the certification that they performed their assigned duties.
summary_one_paragraph: This document consists of several payroll certifications from the U.S. House of Representatives Financial Management System for the Select Committee on Assassinations, covering the accounting period from February 1 to February 28, 1977. It lists numerous employees, their social security numbers, annual salaries, gross pay for the period, and certifications that they performed their official duties and have no relationship to a current Member of Congress. The certifications include names such as Jeremy Ray Akers, Edyth Baish, Elizabeth Berning, and many others, with varying salaries and positions, alongside summaries of clerk hire charges and expenditures.
title: Select Committee on Assassinations Payroll Certification for February 1977
origin_agency: U.S. House of Representatives Financial Management System
